title: what is going on? server?
body: I was playing rank game about a minute ago and my top lane and jungler disconnected. After couple of minutes playing 3v5 I got disconnected from the game and I cant connect to server. What is going on?? Is this just me or everyone is struggling at the moment?

replies.body:
What are people doing playing at 2am?

Nevertheless for something like this Loss Prevented should be enabled.
we were winning our game too...game crashed, unable to contect to server. firewall message error. was in the middle of the game. had no previous problems connecting - dced around 2:56am
yeah my team had the same thing happen only diff was we didnt get off the fountain
Seriously they have to start working on OCE server. Its been happening for a while and its ridiculous. I was winning my game just then and I've got disconnected as well. GG

Also me, and I lost LP for it earlier yesterday morning before I could even buy items.Basically after champion select game wouldnt load.  Riot ignores the question about LP being compensated for so yeah. gg eh?
